original_text:
Were I to write for him my laws by the ten thousands,
    they would be regarded as a strange thing.
korean_text: 내가 그를 위하여 내 율법을 만 가지로 기록하였으나 그들은 이상한 것으로 여기도다

sentences.original_text: Were I to write for him my laws by the ten thousands
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그를 위해 나의 율법을 수만 가지로 기록한다 할지라도

sentences.original_text: they would be regarded as a strange thing.
